Description:
Enslaved The plot is based on the famous Chinese novel "Journey to the West", 
written four centuries ago. Ninja Theory studio suffered a classic story in a 
post-apocalyptic future: after 150 years, the world will be destroyed by war 
and environmental catastrophes, and only a few remain alive. Remain very strong 
and fast fighter Monkey and a young female technician Tripp were captured on one 
of the ships of the slave-owners, who are looking for survivors and transported 
to where not returned. Couple manages to escape, but Trip quickly realizes that 
she can return home only with the help of Monkey. She manages to trick his 
companion, and put on him a special device that connects them together - if 
she dies, he too will be killed. So begins their journey to the west on the 
destroyed and dangerous world.


Features

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Premium Edition includes the original game, and the extra content DLC 
"Pigsy's Perfect 10", as well as skins for characters Ninja Monkey, 
Classic Monkey and Sexy Trip. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cinematic 
As a director of colorful scene clips made popular by Hollywood actor 
Andy Serkis (the films "The Lord of the Rings" and "King Kong"). With him, 
with the help of technology Motion Capture copied movement for the main 
character Monkey. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ World of Tomorrow 
Players will explore the beautiful and terrifying at the same time, 
which was destroyed by the war, the world is ruled by the forces of nature, 
and danger lurks at every turn. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Care and caution 
In the world of Enslaved have to think about every step. Only a careful 
study of the environment and the well-coordinated joint action of Monkey 
and Trip will help to achieve success. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ An old story in a new way 
On the storyline worked well-known writer and screenwriter Alex Garland 
(movie "The Beach" and "28 Days Later"). That it is the author of an 
exciting arrangement of the classic novel "Journey to the West" and the 
history of the relationship of the main characters. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Life in motion 
The combat system is capable of continuous combination of offensive and 
defensive techniques. Special attacks can knock Monkey weapons from enemies, 
enemies to break apart, or beat them with a super-strong blow.
